name: Silence
description: For the duration, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the sphere is immune to thunder damage, and creatures are deafened while inside. Casting a spell with a verbal component is impossible there.

effects.description: Creates a silence zone: blocks sound, deafens creatures inside, prevents verbal casting, and grants immunity to thunder damage within.
